room_title: Escape room "The Otherside" by Escape Room NJ in New York
review: The J0ker was awesome! The perfect blend of Escape Room and Haunted House. We came with a group of 10 and right off the bat the staff is so nice and accommodating. Everyone had a super fun time and we are already planning to go back and play Poison Ivy!

room_title: Escape room "The Otherside" by Escape Room NJ in New York
review: Thank you Sam for being a wonderful host! We had a blast in the scary “Other Side”!

room_title: Escape room "The Otherside" by Escape Room NJ in New York
review: So much fun! This is the first Escape Room that I have ever down with a large group. All of the rooms that I have done in the past were with 2-6 people. In this room we had 15 and I wasn't sure how it would work. Well we Escaped and I am sure we wouldn't have escaped with out the team, we worked so well together and there was so much to do that I can't image having a smaller group. Escape Rooms Rule!

room_title: Escape room "The Otherside" by Escape Room NJ in New York
review: We went as a group not sure what to expect. Had a blast! It's both innovative, challenging & exciting. There was never a dull moment. 2 of us came from Florida to visit and agreed we would want to do this again when we come back.

room_title: Escape room "The Otherside" by Escape Room NJ in New York
review: I went for a girls night out and had the best time and it was an awesome experience . The host at the door set the mood for the qhole event. Was very nice and was nice about having questions. You will be scared and you will never know whats coming next. .

room_title: Escape room "The Otherside" by Escape Room NJ in New York
review: We had alot of fun. We were just one clue away. Can't wait for the next room to be open.

room_title: Escape room "The Otherside" by Escape Room NJ in New York
review: this escape room was awesome, tried it with a group of 3 of my other friends and let me tell you we had fun, it was scary but fun we couldn't stop we had to keep going, lots of clues and things to find, we did not complete it but we got far. come try out the escape room its fun and creepy lol for people who love alittle scare and brain challenge this is it for you.. you have 1 hour to escape. come try it, its in hackensack, best escape room ive seen in new jersey!!!
